metadata.title: Polaris Distance: Historical Timeline (NASA-Standard)
metadata.description: Distance to Polaris calculated in 10-year intervals from 3200 BC to 2500 AD
metadata.calculation_method: Kinematic extrapolation (d = d₀ + v_r · t) using Decimal arithmetic
metadata.extrapolation_note: Future/past distances use radial velocity. Base distance from parallax. Uncertainty grows with time.
